title: MORDERKAISER BROKEN AS FUCK!
body: So I was in a ranked game, yeah? and the enemy team had Morderkaiser and Janna bot, yeah? I was taking my blue when wild morde appears okay, keep in mind I was 3/1/1 yi with bilgewater and like 12 stacks on devourer, morde had BOOTS,RELIC, and a CLOTH ARMOR okay? He came and I was like 3/4 hp? and he just came and I meditated and his Q did 700 magic dmg while I was in meditate, and E did 200 dmg after meditate with no fking items. We were like lvl 7-8. So if he maxed E, then yeah 200 dmg, but he clearly maxed Q, so how the fuck? then after he went like 4/2 sth, and got that claw item that makes u big, and 1 shot viktor at mid. LITERALLY 1 shotted viktor, Viktor rage quittted screaming "RITO ISfcking reatrded" and we lost.

replies.body: Yi is broken, morde takes skill to play.
wow do you not know how to speak yeah and like yeah wtf and yeah and yeah like find a new word bud
Yi is an absolute failure against coordinated teams but requires little skill and is OP against low skill teams, isn't he?
don't forget Skarner, hes broken as....  so thats why always ban Morde and Skarner every single ranked games until next patch
